title: Hey Duggee - Drawing Badge
cardDescription: The Drawing Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 1 and has a red pencil with a green round frame.
description: The Drawing Badge is from Hey Duggee Season 1 Episode 1 and has a red pencil with a green round frame.

content.content: Badge is worked as a spiral so no joining rounds until the outer edge.

content: (3 sc, inc, 2 sc) x6, at last sc pull through with SC [42]
slst, (inc with hdc, 6 hdc) x6, last hdc is made into the first slst, slst [48]

content.content: Fasten off and hide the yarn ends.
If the tip of the pencil comes off deformed, you can make corrections when sewing it to the badge.

content: sc to 2nd ch from hook, 4 sc, 4 sc into last ch, continuing other side of chain 4 sc, 3 sc into first ch, slst with yellow yarn, turn [16]

content.content: Sew in place and hide the yarn ends.
